name: umple-lsp-monorepo
description: Monorepo for Umple Language Server and editor clients

scripts.build-grammar: cd packages/tree-sitter-umple && npx tree-sitter generate && npx tree-sitter build --wasm && cd ../.. && npm run compile
scripts.copy-wasm: cp packages/tree-sitter-umple/tree-sitter-umple.wasm packages/server/tree-sitter-umple.wasm && cp packages/tree-sitter-umple/queries/references.scm packages/server/references.scm && cp packages/tree-sitter-umple/queries/definitions.scm packages/server/definitions.scm
